Give

About Us

Kids Club Kampala (KCK) is a Christian-based charity organization founded in 2009 by three friends: Sam, Olivia, and Corrie. We are registered in Uganda under NGO number MIA/NB/2010/04/2497, the United Kingdom and the Republic of Ireland.

Our Vision

A world in which hope and love for vulnerable children transforms communities.

Join Us

Our Mission

Availing children safe places to play while catering for their physical, emotional and spiritual needs as well as empowering them to realise their God-given potential.

Join Us

Our Leadership Team

We are a diverse team of young, driven and resourceful project managers, social workers, administrators and volunteers creating an impact in Kampala slums and Uganda as a whole.

HON. DR. SIRANDA GERALD BLACKS

Chairperson Board of Directors

He is currently a member of the East African Legislative Assembly, chairperson Regional Affairs and Conflicts Resolution Committee.

SAMUEL WAMBAYO

Founder / Executive Director

A trained child consultant and development practitioner with an MA in Community Participation and Strategic Management.

JUSTINE NAMUYOMBA

Head of Finance and Administration

Ms.Namuyomba Justine is a results oriented officer with over 9 years of experience in financial management, budgeting, reporting, and administrative operations. Currently pursuing level 4 of the Certified Public Accountants (CPAU) qualification, Justine holds a degree in Bsc.Accounting from Ndejje University.

Where We Work

We currently work in a total of 10 Kampala slums and other parts of Uganda; our early childhood education project runs in Katanga, Naguru and Namuwongo. Our skilling centres are located in Katanga and Naguru. Our transitional home is in Busiika, Luwero district. Safeguarding programmes run across Kampala, Wakiso, Mpigi, Pallisa and Luweero.
